languages.text: {n}Идира смотрит на вас долгим взглядом.{/n} "Я прошла через столь многое, чтобы обезопасить себя и вас... не думаю, что меня интересует что-то кроме оправдания ожиданий, возложенных на меня. Я — инструмент вашей воли, Лорд-капитан. И этого вполне довольно".

{n}Idira gives you a long look.{/n} "I've gone through so much to keep you and me safe... I don't think I'm interested in anything other than living up to the expectations placed on me. I am an instrument of your will, Lord Captain. And that is enough."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира смотрит на вас долгим взглядом.{/n} "Я прошла через столь многое, чтобы обезопасить себя и вас... не думаю, что меня интересует что-то кроме оправдания ожиданий, возложенных на меня. Я — инструмент вашей воли, Лорд-капитан. И этого вполне довольно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira gives you a long look.{/n} "I went through so much to keep myself and you safe..... I do not think I am interested in anything other than living up to the expectations placed on me. I am an instrument of your will, Lord Captain. And this is enough."

{n}Idira gives you a long look.{/n} "I went through so much to keep myself and you safe..... I do not think I am interested in anything other than living up to the expectations placed on me. I am an instrument of your will, Lord Captain. And this is enough."

{n}Idira gives you a long look.{/n} "I've gone through so much to keep you and me safe..... I don't think I'm interested in anything other than living up to the expectations placed on me. I am an instrument of your will, Lord Captain. And that is enough."

{n}Idira gives you a long look.{/n} "I've gone through so much to keep you and me safe..... I don't think I'm interested in anything other than living up to the expectations placed on me. I am an instrument of your will, Lord Captain. And that is enough."

{n}Idira gives you a long look.{/n} "I've gone through so much to keep you and me safe... I don't think I'm interested in anything other than living up to the expectations placed on me. I am an instrument of your will, Lord Captain. And that is enough."

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉看了你很久。{/n}“我经历了这么多事情，保证你我二人的安全……除了实现你的期望之外，我对其他任何事情都不感兴趣。我是你意志的工具，舰长大人，这就足够了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira gives you a long look.{/n} "I've gone through so much to keep you and me safe... I don't think I'm interested in anything other than living up to the expectations placed on me. I am an instrument of your will, Lord Captain. And that is enough."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉看了你很久。{/n}“我经历了这么多事情，保证你我二人的安全……除了实现你的期望之外，我对其他任何事情都不感兴趣。我是你意志的工具，舰长大人，这就足够了。”

languages.text: {n}Idira te mira durante un largo momento.{/n} «He pasado tanto para mantenernos a salvo... no sé si me interesa algo más allá de estar a la altura de las expectativas. Soy un instrumento de su voluntad, Lord Capitán, y con eso me basta».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira gives you a long look.{/n} "I've gone through so much to keep you and me safe... I don't think I'm interested in anything other than living up to the expectations placed on me. I am an instrument of your will, Lord Captain. And that is enough."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira te mira durante un largo momento.{/n} «He pasado tanto para mantenernos a salvo... no sé si me interesa algo más allá de estar a la altura de las expectativas. Soy un instrumento de su voluntad, Lord Capitán, y con eso me basta».

languages.text: {n}イディラはあなたをじっと見つめる。{/n}「あなたと自分の安全を守るために多くのことを経験してきたわ…あたい、期待に応えること以外に、何も興味を抱くことはないと思うの。ロード・キャプテン、あたいはあなたの意思を達成するための道具。それで十分よ」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira gives you a long look.{/n} "I've gone through so much to keep you and me safe... I don't think I'm interested in anything other than living up to the expectations placed on me. I am an instrument of your will, Lord Captain. And that is enough."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラはあなたをじっと見つめる。{/n}「あなたと自分の安全を守るために多くのことを経験してきたわ…あたい、期待に応えること以外に、何も興味を抱くことはないと思うの。ロード・キャプテン、あたいはあなたの意思を達成するための道具。それで十分よ」

languages.text: {n}Idira blickt dich lange an.{/n} "Ich habe so viel durchgemacht, um Euch und mich zu beschützen ... Ich glaube, mich interessiert nur eines, nämlich die Erwartungen zu erfüllen, die man in mich gesetzt hat. Ich bin ein Instrument Eures Willens, Lord Captain. Und das reicht."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira gives you a long look.{/n} "I've gone through so much to keep you and me safe... I don't think I'm interested in anything other than living up to the expectations placed on me. I am an instrument of your will, Lord Captain. And that is enough."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira blickt dich lange an.{/n} "Ich habe so viel durchgemacht, um Euch und mich zu beschützen ... Ich glaube, mich interessiert nur eines, nämlich die Erwartungen zu erfüllen, die man in mich gesetzt hat. Ich bin ein Instrument Eures Willens, Lord Captain. Und das reicht."

languages.text: {n}Idira vous regarde longuement.{/n} « Après tout ce que j'ai enduré pour assurer notre sécurité... la seule chose qui m'intéresse, c'est de me montrer à la hauteur de vos attentes. Je suis l'instrument de votre volonté, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, et ça me suffit amplement. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira gives you a long look.{/n} "I've gone through so much to keep you and me safe... I don't think I'm interested in anything other than living up to the expectations placed on me. I am an instrument of your will, Lord Captain. And that is enough."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira vous regarde longuement.{/n} « Après tout ce que j'ai enduré pour assurer notre sécurité... la seule chose qui m'intéresse, c'est de me montrer à la hauteur de vos attentes. Je suis l'instrument de votre volonté, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, et ça me suffit amplement. »

languages.text: {n}İdira sana uzun uzun bakıyor.{/n} "Seni ve kendimi güvende tutmak için çok çaba sarf ettim. Bana yönelik beklentileri karşılamaktan başka herhangi bir şeyle ilgilenmiyorum. Ben senin iradenin bir uzantısıyım Lord Kaptan. Bu da benim için yeterli."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira gives you a long look.{/n} "I've gone through so much to keep you and me safe... I don't think I'm interested in anything other than living up to the expectations placed on me. I am an instrument of your will, Lord Captain. And that is enough."
